    Connect With Us



Hello! How Can We Help You?
We can't wait to hear from you, whether you've got a question for us or would like to share some feedback. Explore the options on this page, or just scroll down to fill out our quick inquiry form and we'll get back to you soon.





Toggle Section





                                                Contact a Department 

                                            

Admission | (714) 997-6711 | admit@chapman.edu
Financial Aid | (714) 997-6741 | finaid@chapman.edu
Human Resources | (714) 997-6686 | hroffice@chapman.edu 
Media Relations | (714) 744-7677 | pr@chapman.edu 
Public Safety | (714) 997-6763 (24-hour Dispatch)
Registrar | (714) 997-6701 | registrar@chapman.edu
Student Business Services | (714) 997-6617 | ocbusn@chapman.edu
Accessibility Concerns | (714) 997-6847 | Report an issue






                                                Directories and Listings

                                            

Faculty Directory 
Looking for a member of our world-class faculty? Search our database to find full-time, adjunct and emeritus faculty at Chapman University. You can find a specific person by name, or get a listing of all faculty in a given school, college or department.
Explore the Faculty Directory »

A-Z Listing of Services and Departments 
Our alphabetically organized listing of key departments and services at Chapman University will help you get in touch with the right person or team. 
Explore the Alphabetical Listing of Services and Departments »

Campus Services
Browse a listing of campus services including Public Safety, IS&T, Parking and Transportation, Conference Services and more. 
Explore Campus Services »

Phone Directory
Are you a current student, staff or faculty member looking for another member of the Chapman campus community? Use our searchable database of all employees (staff, faculty or administration) to locate someone by name or the department in which they work. Please note, this is a secured resource for current Chapman students, staff and faculty and requires a network account to access it.
Explore the Phone Directory »

Can't find the answer to your question on our website? Got something to share with us? Send us a message and we'll get back to you shortly. The more specific you are with your question or feedback, the better we'll be able to help you.
Online Form - About Chapman: Connect With Us

Website Feedback 







Not sure which office?

Use these guidelines to know which office to select on the form on this page:
Admission (for admission information, admissions status, campus tours)
Financial Aid (for scholarships, grants, loans, work study, and school codes)
Human Resources (for hiring, benefits, student employment, employment verification)
Media Contact (for press, public relations, News & Stories, Chapman Magazine)
Registrar (for registration, enrollment, transcripts, degrees conferral, records)
Student Business Services (for tuition and fees, room and board, refunds)
